question: [Brief] Espanol: Identifica the slope of the noisy line para la recta dibujada.

qas.question: [Brief] Espanol: Identifica the slope of the noisy line para la recta dibujada.
[Explain] Svenska: Ange the intercept of the noisy line for linjen i diagrammet.
[Note] Turkce: Cizilen dogru icin the value of y when x equals 1 belirt.
